document.full_text: tokyo electric power co (tepco) said on friday it had connected an external transmission line with the stricken daiichi nuclear power plant in japan and confirmed that electricity can be supplied.
document.title: tepco connects line, can get power to daiichi plant
lines_and_colors: tokyo electric power co (tepco) said on friday it had connected an external transmission line with the stricken daiichi nuclear power plant in japan and confirmed that electricity can be supplied.
